info.+content: What's Michael is a set of episodic stories about the lives of cats and their owners, there is no continuity from episode to episode. Michael goes into heat so his owners buy him a mate. Michael, Popo and their kittens attack a teddy bear that has invaded their house. Michale catches the fleas. The Freyman Reaction is explained. (from manga)
#1: "マイケル音頭" by Mami Yamase
#1: "星空のエトランゼ" by Mami Yamase
